name: AnimaLudo
description: Ludo is a party board, once played by kings, and now you, your family and friends can enjoy it. While the gameplay of Ludo may be simple at first, it is in fact challenging and very enjoyable. Think carefully about your next move, stay one step ahead of your opponents and return safely from your journey. Beat your rivals and compete for the highest score on the luckiest #7 leaderboard!

name: Sleepless: A Midsummer Night's Dream
description:
This new tale from the delightfully twisted mind of Sei Shojo, the creator of Bible Black, is set in the Black Rose Manor, where Mamiya Marie, the CEO of a powerful conglomerate, lives with her youngest daughter, Maria, and a stoic maid, Aira. When Takamiya Ryohei arrives to be Maria's new tutor, he has no idea what kind of tantalizing web he's just fallen into. As the women lure him into debauchery, all his lesson plans soon come unraveled.

Yet all is not as it seems in the manor. Surely there must be some reason other than her daughter that keeps such a powerful and important CEO here within its halls. There's also the mystery of why the room next door is strictly forbidden.

name: Upaon: A Snake's Journey
description: Help this sympathetic Snake on her journey to the hidden treasure, solve puzzles that mix mechanics of the classic game Snake with Sokoban.

name: Shopping Mahjong connect
description: Shopping Mahjong connect is a tile-matching puzzle game. Simply connect pairs adjacent to each other and on the outer edge of the board!

name: Bro Falls: Ultimate Showdown
description: Bro Falls is an asymmetric massively multiplayer party game with chaotic elements, trap activations and big Falls. Up-to 60 online players in a showdown party and only one who can get the victory. Play as Brokkoli to activate the traps or avoid them as a juicy food and win the rounds.

name: Independence Day Break
description: Independence Day Break is an arcade game that lets the user break Independence Day themed characters with a unique paddle and ball. Unique animated levels, Mini-Bosses and powerups to collect while you progress through the levels. Thirty Levels to play in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory. Single player retro-arcade fun!

name: Flowerpatch
description: An early-access farming mmo about collecting and growing cannabis

name: Space Colonies
description: A fast-paced strategy game for 2-4 players, where players control an alien race and compete to explore and colonize planets to earn the most resources and victory points. The key mechanic is that you will have to manage your resources well while you battle with players in exciting wager battles! Want to deny a player a valuable planet? You can choose to harness the Destructoid for a turn and vaporize any planet before your opponent can finish colonizing it.

name: Lysfangha
description: Embody the demi-goddess Imë and purify the temple where the Lysfangha is kept. Using your temporal powers, duplicate yourself by going back in time. Cooperate with your clones to repel the invasion!

name: Roguely
description: Roguely is a fantasy themed, top-down shooter, pixel art, action roguelite with some bullet hell thrown in. Fight and dodge your way through the randomly generated levels to rescue your friends. Find upgrades along the way and save up arcane fragments for permanent blessings from the gods.

name: #1 Crosswords Bundle
description:
Enjoy 2 great crosswords games in 1 with this bundle containing both #1 Crosswords and #1 Anagrams.

#1 Crosswords Are you a fan of crosswords? Do you enjoy spending time solving challenging word puzzles? #1 Crosswords is the game for you! In #1 Crosswords you'll find a story mode with 100 crossword puzzles to solve for all difficulty levels. On top of that, you can always play the daily crossword, which is the same for everyone in the world, and as many random crosswords as you want. #1 Anagrams More Crossword Anagrams than you can Shake a Stick at! Do you enjoy crosswords or word games? Uncover hidden words: connect the letters, interpret the clues, improve your vocabulary, try your memory, challenge yourself and test your English skills.

name: SpellHunter
description: A puzzle game for young and old ... to relax on the bus and train or learn to read and write for the younger among us. The atmospheric pictures and music pieces relax and motivate in equal measure.

name: Party Host 85
description: Party like it's 1985! You're the host of the wildest party of the century and have to plan and execute a succesful event. Get to know all the crazy characters and discover what they do will once the party started.

name: Skyward Descent
description: Use your jet to manoeuvre through and burn enemies. Discover powerful item synergies. Die repeatedly to tough bosses.

name: Mysterious Blocks 2
description: Mysterious Blocks 2 is the second part of an exciting puzzle game in which you will find many interesting and difficult levels.

name: Ethernal War
description: Ethernal War is a third person hybrid of MOBA, Tower Defence and Strategie game. Fight online against other players, place buildings to build an army and destroy the enemy main building.

name: Infected City
description: Infected City is a first person shooter. In this game, all people have turned into zombies. You have to pick up dusty weapons and protect yourself, and most importantly, save your beloved wife from hordes of bloodthirsty zombies.

name: Hentai VR 4
description: The ultimate sexy VR game is here! Prepare to experience VR like never before! A world of pleasures that you have never experienced before is waiting for you — just put on your VR headset.

name: Demon Cycle
description: Demon Cycle is a casual strategy game, where luck favors the prepared. You have limited turns to make enough coins to pass the floor. Your choices will determine the outcome.

name: Devileader
description: Devileader, a fearsome space demon who once have destroyed countless planets of the solar system is about to be resurrected by his minions and fanatics, who want to bring chaos to the universe. Pilot the agile space interceptor Deviship and survive the terror of this demon lord.

name: Mousey Mick
description: Mousey Mick is a 2D Platformer developed by Jackrifleman. In Mousey Mick, you run, jump, wall-jump, dodge and dash your way through various worlds and their stages.

name: Loopindex
description: It's time to explore the virtual land of Loopindex! Its vast, uncharted lands are full of puzzles to solve! Play alone, or team up with a robo-friend, and use logic and timing to clear each area. The difficulty will test your ingenuity as you explore the unique “loop mechanic” at the core of the gameplay loop. You’ll take on levels full of traps and discovery, befriend virtual creatures, and even battle against cool bosses.

name: BattleDead
description: District 11 is known for being completely shut down to the outside world, with the level of infection relatively high. The last team that went in weren't sure if the people there were alive or dead. For the world to get back to any normality, you must clean up the district.

name: Rumble Runners
description: Race over randomly generated tracks through space in this competitive running racing game! Find power-ups and traps along the way that can either aid you or send you hurtling back to the planet below! You can even customize your character and parts of the tracks. No match is the same!

name: Athletics 3: Summer Sports
description: Practice athletic sports in a realistic 3D environment through 42 events & 9 online multiplayer competitions!

name: Sweet Sugar Candy
description: Explore a beautiful world full of candy. Develop your skills in an hundred of well-designed levels, while collecting and using power-ups wisely. Match and crush three or more of the same candies to complete levels, using special candies where possible! You'll find more fun in this game than in any other Match game! Collect virtual currency throughout the levels (no extra purchase required, you play to win) and try your luck at the Wheel of Fortune. Sweet Sugar Candy will bring you many hours of fun!

name: Sentenced VR
description: What does it mean to become an agent of authority? Master the art of beheading, become an agent of authority, and enact a divine drama of justice, death, and redemption.

name: Menherafflesia Flowering Abyss
description:
"Open your eyes. You can see the beautiful sky, right?"

As Itarou spends his monotonic days, he unknowingly gets lost in a poisonous flower garden. Let's make the colorful flowers bloom here now...

"Menherafflesia Flowering Abyss" is an ADV game where you choose one of five types of flowers to capture the menhera heroines.

name: Hoshi Ori Yume Mirai: Perfect Edition
description: Hoshi Ori Yume Mirai: Perfect Edition is a remastered version of the Hoshi Ori Yume Mirai, with upscaled CGs with new scenes from the console versions.

name: Farming Simulator 17: Ambassador Edition
description:
Take on the role of a modern farmer in Farming Simulator 17! Immerse yourself in a huge open world loaded with a harvest of new content. Explore farming possibilities over hundreds of acres of land, including a detailed new North American environment. Drive over 250 authentic farming vehicles and equipment from over 75 manufacturers, including new brands such as Challenger, Fendt, Valtra or Massey Ferguson.

Harvest many types of crops, including for the first time sunflowers and soy beans. Take care of your livestock - cows, sheep, chicken and now pigs - take part in forestry, and sell your products to expand your farm! Transport your goods with trucks and trailers, or load and drive trains to reach your destination. Grow your farm online with other players, and download community created mods for an ever-expanding Farming Simulator experience!

Included with this unique package is Farming Simulator 17 plus all of the expansion packs created for the game in-disc! These are:
Platinum Expansion
Big Bud Pack
Ropa Pack
Kuhn Equipment Pack

name: Firefighters: The Simulation - Platinum Edition
description:
Buildings ablaze, people screaming and flames shooting several feet high! Welcome to the professional fire brigade. You and your team will experience the exciting work of the professional fire brigade, surviving realistic missions where you extinguish house fires, salvage and neutralize extremely toxic and hazardous substances, and accomplish many other fascinating tasks.

You and your colleagues will combat fire in an attempt to stop its destructive power. Solve seemingly impossible tasks, and use your equipment and special vehicles as you fight the flames. From small fires to structural fires to gas explosions, the factory fire defence has everything that a fire department faces at a modern industrial site.

name: Gallantry
description: Relive the Medieval Tournament as you compete across Europe in order to be crowned the Grand Champion and fulfil your Father's legacy.

name: Super Squad
description: Super Squad is a team-based Multiplayer Online Shoot-‘Em-Up (MOSH) where squads duke it out in a manic-strategic battle for domination. Tactics, teamwork and twitch reflexes are required to claim victory over the enemy Squad, with top-down shooter controls, an abundance of awesome abilities, and a multitude of modes to master.

name: The Fate of the Bully
description: Let me introduce myself, I'm a mugger, a thief. Do not rush to turn away from me his "Holy" face. Every one of you could be in my place.

name: Midnight Caravan
description:
Midnight Caravan, a richly illustrated choose-your-own-adventure with an unique narrative arc set in an age renowned for its shadiness, where nothing is only what it appears to be.

Midnight Caravan is an interactive story that puts the player in the shoes of a man, living a gripping story of vengeance, politic, intrigues, espionage and much more, through the entire Italian peninsula. The game tells the story of a caravan of outcasts led by the player, involved in a dangerous travel across the country: from Rome to Venice, passing through Florence. Gamblers, prostitutes, murderers, thieves: though moral choices and crimes set the tone for this story-driven gem. A creepy atmosphere envelops the journey: will you protect your people or will you pursue your own fortune? Experience the nomadic life of a caravan leader, rejected by everybody without a reason, chased by justice and hunted by unknown enemies!

name: Shoot & Destroy X
description: Sin descripción

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: A-Gun MP040
description: This DLC contains the Map No.216-220.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: A-Gun MP041
description: This DLC contains the Map No.221-225

name: Dream of Life
description:
You play as a boy named Enil.

Enil always fantasized about being able to lucid dream, unfortunately, he has no experience on it, so you will have to make him improve.

Play in a half accurate simulation of lucid dreaming, released for the Yume Nikki Dream Diary Jam 5.

name: Sqube Darkness
description: A unique endless running game. Only 1% of the racers reached 5000 meters!

name: Dying Light: Savvy Gamer Bundle
description: Find out how to turn a tablet, LED lights and a few cables into awesome combat gear with this new Savvy Gamer bundle!

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Vol. 4 - Shirasagi ni Aka no Hane
description:
This year, red leaves are dancing in the hearts of the white herons left behind. The story of assistant detective Shirasagisu Itsuna and her unknown past.

“I… where was I trying to go? ”

This story begins with the protagonist, who has lost her memory, waking up in a mountain forest filled with autumn leaves.

The protagonist is rescued by a high school girl who calls herself ``Taihouin Izuna'' and learns that this is Momoshiro Village, a small village deep in the mountains of A Prefecture.

Who am I? Why did you come to such a remote village? Why did I lose my memory?

As the protagonist works with Ituna to unravel her memories, she becomes embroiled in the inheritance issues swirling around the village.

This is a sad and heartbreaking incident that leads her to pursue her career as a detective. In this work, you can enjoy the first and second parts of "Crimson Feathers on the White Heron".

name: Writhe
description: I feel the writhing. I hear her call.

name: Retro Goal
description:
Retro Goal is a mix of arcade soccer action and simple team management, from the developers of New Star Soccer and Retro Bowl.
With graphics inspired by football games of 16-bit era and modern touchscreen controls, you'll be slotting away goal after goal. Choose a team from the world's favourite leagues and recruit the superstars, professionals and hotheads who will lead to victory - then take full control on the pitch and make every touch count!

name: Cog Owl
description: Jump higher and higher as you clean the clockworks of reality from the cosmic waste!

name: My Cosmic Sweetheart
description:
Perhaps it was written in the stars...

When a UFO lands in your school and two cute alien transferees emerge, it can only mean one thing—your life as you know it is bound for changes that are out of this world!

name: A Bird's Tale
description: Help keep a happy home in this short hand-crafted platformer telling a touching tale about a bird, it's children and their home.

name: Shiro to Kuro no Alice for Nintendo Switch
description: Shiro to Kuro no Alice for Nintendo Switch is a bundle of both Shiro to Kuro no Alice games.

name: Light and Night
description:
There is 1 exile out of every 10,000 people in this world. They were once known as Gods’ equal. However, because they pointed out God’s crimes against the people… They were massacred. Their existence, erased from all records. Banished to the bottom of the ocean.

Many thousands of years later saw some of the survivors fighting for a place amongst the humans; to survive. Evan: “I’ve already survived and gotten out of that place alive.” Osborn: “There’s no need for us to be ashamed of who we are and what we are by hiding within the human crowds.” Sariel: “All I wish for, is to bring her back to life.”

Their obsession with finding out the truth and reason behind it all, has become the strength they draw upon to continue surviving. Charlie: “A new world… I will be waiting for you here.” Jesse: “To return the truth back to history. That is my mission.”

The past gave them the strength to continue fighting; The fateful event from which everything began.

name: Tile Blocks
description: Place strategically the objects provided to you and Clampy to be able to reach the goal! There's several elements you can use, like boxes, bombs, springs, balloons, and many others. Once you have finished, press the play button and Clampy will start walking! If Clampy can't reach the goal, you can come back to the place mode and the objects will come back to where you place them. You can try as many times you want until you manage to beat the level!

name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2: Chara Pack 1
description: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Remilia Scarlet, Komeji Satori, Aki Sizuha, Tsukumo Benben and Yorigami Shion. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.

name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2: Chara Pack 3
description: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Yukari Yakumo, Eirin Yagokoro, Yasaka Kanako, Junko and Kazami Yuka. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.

name: Animators Hell
description: A UCN style game that includes the oc's of popular SFM YouTubers. Fend off against the animators in your own personalized hell until 6 am.

name: Melodramatica
description: A charming management game set in an old Victorian Threatre. You are put in charge of a troupe of actors, it's your job to make sure your actors and the stage are ready to put on a perfect show! Train your actors, resolve their conflicts, dress up your troupe and set the stage for the final play!

name: Cream Me
description: Relax class puzzle and flipping card game to keep you in a good mood

name: Adam the Storyteller
description: Help Adam to solve puzzles around him after being kidnapped by a mysterious land-grabbing floating island. A hand-drawn puzzle-adventure with funny characters, hundred levels and power-up puzzles with unique abilities that will help You to get through a puzzle maze.

name: Vertical Slice: A Game Dev Story
description: From nobody to famous game producer in 3 years: that’s the journey you will live! Experience the trials and tribulations of game development in this life simulation game: live through the process of founding a small team and learning how to work together to develop a successful game.

name: Reginald's Death Arena
description: 4 player chaotic single screen battle arena, with multiple game modes, items, and quirky mechanics. Regurgitate what you eat onto opponents with various status effects depending on what you consumed. Burn it all to the ground!

name: The Lost Robot: Jigsaw Puzzle Stories
description: Find help for a lost robot by restoring its memory.

name: The Phenomenon of Edgar Allan Poe 1/2
description: A horror novel visual in which you can choose a way, anime style.

name: Equestrian Training
description: Alone or with friends, discover a new way to learn more about horses and riding. Based on the official FFE (French horse-riding federation) diplomas, known as Galops, the game helps you improve in the training mode, test your knowledge in the exam mode and have fun with the various mini-games.

name: Puzzle Girl
description: This is a puzzle game to break through and unlock. Every level is a sexy and lovely maid with perfect figure and exposed clothes, which makes players full of fantasy. Players can have a perfect maid when they complete a puzzle.

name: Dama Gallery
description: First Exhibition: "Digital Genesis" Freely explorable digital art gallery

name: Fate of Windshift
description:
It's a turned base anime style jrpg, which takes place in a magic land where the fourth main elements Wind, earth, Fire and Water give special Feng-Shui powers to certain individuals.
Story takes place at the beginning of the militarized years of the protagonist Onikirimaru, and his adventures across the land of Wind.

name: VR Future Wars: Aircraft Carrier-UAV Confrontation
description: It's time to show off your superb flying skills. Put on a VR helmet and you will act as an air force, fly a top fighter, and defend the aircraft carrier alone and annihilate the enemy.

name: Sisters of Silent Liberty
description: Game Features - 6 Player Free For All Game Mode -Play Together - Different Weapon Classes - AI With Different Style Patterns -Different Characters With Different Ability's -Dangerous Weaponry

name: Quiet Valley 2
description: A 2.5D indie horror game with a strange reverse-fish-eye presentation. Explore and uncover lore and scares. Contains jumpscares and atmospheric/story-driven elements. Be thorough to unlock both endings if you are a completionist, but watch out behind you.

name: Unreal Golf
description: "UNREAL GOLF" is a 2d physics arcade game with a side view. The main goal is to get your ball into the hole with 3 hits.

name: Snake Deluxe
description: Nine different game modes, achievements, leaderboards and a quirky soundtrack. It's Snake Deluxe.

name: Tanks: The Crusades
description: A top-down shooter with tanks that have various assorted abilities, with support for multiplayer and a level editor.

name: Arcade Archives: Shingen Samurai-Fighter
description: Shingen Samurai-Fighter is an action game released by Jaleco in 1988. The player controls Takeda Shingen, embarking on a grand journey to defeat Uesugi Kenshin. Pick up the 風(Fu), 林(Rin), 火(Ka), 山(Zan), and other items that power you up as you defeat enemy warlords.

name: Necronomistore: Before Black Friday
description: Before Necronomistore was the titan of an industry that became too big for its own boots, it was just a humble shanty shop with an empthisis on saving space and serving the worst living and undeadbeings in the local area.

name: Tankbox
description: Tankbox is a top-down perspective/orthographic shooter. Fight it out against specialized AI-controlled tanks cooperatively with a friend or by yourself.

name: Monster Slayer
description: Monster Slayer is a sci-fi style hunting FPS game where you fight extraterrestrial monsters that proliferate on an island on Earth. The gun that the Player is equipped with has three different types of bullets, and you must use the unique effects of each to fight your way through!

name: 7th Chance
description: 7th Chance is a short story-based exploration adventure game where you make choices that determine the fate of your character.

name: The Wind: A Story of Surrender
description: A short side-scrolling platformer about a little bird who lost the ability to fly. With about 40 minutes to an hour filled with parkour and puzzles, this cute little story aims to teach an important lesson to people who struggle to overcome emotional trauma.

name: Shipwreck Escape
description: Shipwreck Escape is a 2,5D immersive game with puzzle elements. The catastrophe happened when the cruise ship was sailing from Athens to Dubai. The main character is a croupier in a ship's casino and he got stuck in this sinking hell.

name: Was It Worth It?
description: Was it Worth it? is a first person story driven walking simulator. You play as Subject 105 and you do as you're told. DO NOT explore. DO NOT get tempted to stray from the path. DO build your new reality and enjoy your new life on earth.

name: Cube Blast: Match
description: Cube Blast will challenge even the most reputable puzzle solvers with a mind bending 3D twist on the classic color blast formula. Push your spatial thinking abilities to their limits, as you solve increasingly complex puzzles on a 3D tower of colorful blocks, with new and exciting mechanical twists popping up, just when you thought you saw all the game has to offer. If you are not yet convinced: there are also aliens, and explosions!

name: Cantaloper
description: Cantaloper is a very difficult platformer in which you use your legs to charge jumps and climb out of a deep pit. You'll play as a beautiful cantaloupe with human legs that must ascend out from the underground depths he finds himself in. There are no checkpoints; every fall will set you back based solely on how far you fall. Can you make it up two long levels? Will you elope?

name: Real Farm: Gold Edition
description: Grow your way to success in Real Farm. Work your way up from nothing in career mode or start with an established farm in free mode. Complete jobs and manage land, crops, animals and staff as you strive to become a respected farmer in the community.

name: Tin Tandem
description: Climb the perilous heights with Axle & Arx and don't look down! Through speed, precision and teamwork, conquer their greatest challenge in the formidable platformer - Tin Tandem.

name: Worth Life
description:
It's a world like a picture book. A slow-life fantasy action game.
The brilliance of the crystal has been lost, and things are happening in various places.
The protagonist cultivates vacant lots obtained during the trip to grow crops, build fishing ponds, build houses and rent them out to people in need, sometimes with swords and bows.

name: Conet
description:
"Conet" is an extremely simple one-on-one strategy game of dots and boxes.

Black is the first player and white is the second player.
Clicking the square dots will connect them with lines to any other adjacent square dots that have already been clicked, scoring you one point for each line formed.
Both players take in turns clicking the square dots until they have all been clicked, and the player with the most points wins!
The special "lonely points" rule also means that any square dots that have not been connected to any others are worth three points each.

name: Artemishea
description: Step into a unforgiving world of danger and try to survive as you compete among other players to stay alive, Play as a animal and take down large prey as you progress along in your life. Hunt, Survive and Thrive in this land.

name: Haru to Shura
description: A low-fantasy, fable-like tale following its protagonist Chihiro, an ordinary high school student who stumbles into a mysterious new world. At first Chihiro is carefree, assuming that this is merely a dream he will eventually wake up from. However, he is soon unwittingly entangled in the sinister events and suspicious schemes of the village and its inhabitants...

name: Réussir: Galops 1 à 7
description: Sin descripción

name: The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos - Chicken Edition
description:
Are you ready to dive into a tactical RPG chock-full of charm, humor and crazy characters?! They are clumsy, inexperienced and feisty but they'll have to endure each other's company to get the dungeon's treasure. However, a feeling of déjà-vu quickly arises...
Guide this team of unlikely heroes in an adventure full of humor and chaos!

name: Samurai Warriors 5: Ikkitousen Box
description:
This edition includes the following:

- Samurai Warriors 5
- Character Artbook
- Original Soundtrack x 2
- Post Card Set
- Cloth Poster
- Mini Acrylic Stand Set

name: Nayuta no Kiseki: Kai
description:
Nayuta no Kiseki—an ambitious entry in the Trails series originally released for PSP in 2012 that adopts action RPG-style gameplay—returns for PlayStation 4 as the latest entry in the Kai series (enhanced ports of older Falcom games).

In addition to new illustrations for the main characters, new illustrations have also been added for each of the characters that appear on “Remnant Island,” where the game’s story is set. Graphical elements have also been significantly enhanced, including dedicated illustrations for event scenes and other visual aspects.

There are also various other upgrades that take advantage of PlayStation 4, including 60 frames per second support, high-definition image quality, and high-quality background music and sound effects, making the story of Nayuta no Kiseki more accessible than ever before."

name: Samurai Warriors 5: Treasure Box
description:
Experience exhilarating action set in a dramatic historical setting in SAMURAI WARRIORS 5. As the latest numbered entry in the SAMURAI WARRIORS franchise, the story, characters, and visuals have been re-imagined to set the stage for a thrilling new series. The story takes place after the Ōnin War during the golden age of the Sengoku period, and features a story that centers on the lives of two of the most representative military commanders of this era: Nobunaga Oda and Mitsuhide Akechi.

Samurai Warriors 5 - Treasure Box Includes:
- Samurai Warriors 5 Base Game
- Cloth Poster (B2 Size)
- Original Soundtrack CD (2Disc)
- Character Artbook
- Postcard Set (All Main Characters, w/ Display Case)

name: Hamidashi Creative: Limited Edition
description:
Hamidashi Creative is a romantic visual novel with a school setting.

The limited edition includes:
PS4 Game: Hamidashi Creative
Special Illustrated Box
B2 Tapestry
Acrylic Figure
Original Soundtrack CD

name: The Cruel King and the Great Hero: Storybook Edition
description: This edition includes the following PS4 Game: The Wicked King and the Noble Hero, Original Box, Mini artbook, Soundtrack CD x 2

name: The Caligula Effect 2: First Press Limited Edition
description:
In The Caligula Effect 2 a virtuadoll named Regret has created the world of Redo in order to save people from their past regrets by unknowingly imprisoning them in a simulation. However, this "paradise" is shaken to the core when a virtual idol named X breaks into Regret's virtual reality and restores a high school student's memories of the real world. In order to escape Redo, they re-establish the Go-Home Club, a resistance group that seeks to fight against Regret and her enforcers, the Obbligato Musicians.

The First Press Limited Edition contains:
- Game: The Caligula Effect 2
- Special album CD Side
- Special art book (100 page)
- Oguchi-illustrated image reproduction
- The Caligula Effect 2 documentary movie DVD
- Additional music DLC
- In-game item DLC
- Special illustrated box

name: Ken ga Kimi for S
description:
In the early stages of the Edo period, Kayo lives with her father in a food & tea house. One day, she was asked by the Princess of Sunpu Castellan for an odd favor. Because they are splitting images of each other, she was asked to take her place in a marriage promenade…

Bewildered, but with her mindset, Kayo departs on a journey from the Tokaido region with six samurai for bodyguards on a marriage promenade to Edo, Hakone, Mishima, up till the destination in Sunpu.

On the way towards Edo, she becomes caught up in youkai with destructive abilities, as well as the ‘Sword Retrieving Imperial Match’ that concerns the legendary five great swords, which is really a cover for a sickening ritual being performed…

Through the crisscrossing and intertwining of paths, finally, the road splits into two: One, living with the sword in the path of war. Two, living with you in the path of peace.

The destiny they find their way through to is…?

name: The Cruel King and the Great Hero
description: This game is an RPG starring the human child Yuu, who longs to become a "hero," and the dragon "Overlord" who fosters her.

name: Hamidashi Creative
description: Hamidashi Creative is a romantic visual novel with a school setting.

name: Kingdom Builders
description: Build your kingdom building by building, having villagers join your side. Lead them to expand your empire, defeating foes hindering your empire's growth.

name: The Caligula Effect 2
description: In The Caligula Effect 2 a virtuadoll named Regret has created the world of Redo in order to save people from their past regrets by unknowingly imprisoning them in a simulation. However, this "paradise" is shaken to the core when a virtual idol named X breaks into Regret's virtual reality and restores a high school student's memories of the real world. In order to escape Redo, they re-establish the Go-Home Club, a resistance group that seeks to fight against Regret and her enforcers, the Obbligato Musicians.

name: Legend of Mana
description:
Set off on a journey to find the mystical Mana Tree seen in a dream, before discovering... the world map is empty! During your travels, you’ll acquire special artifacts; place these wherever you’d like on the map to bring towns and dungeons to life and advance the story.

Meet a colorful cast of characters, square off against fearsome monsters, and explore the vast world of Fa’Diel. Not only has the music been rearranged for this remaster, you can also alternate between the new and original soundtrack. Other features have also been added, including the ability to turn off enemy encounters. The game includes ""Ring Ring Land"", a mini game never before released in the West.

name: Mario Golf: Super Rush
description: Tee off with family and friends in the biggest Mario Golf game yet! Hit the green with up to four players locally or online and golf with familiar Mushroom Kingdom characters. Modes range from Standard Golf to the energetic Speed Golf and an RPG-like golf adventure in story mode. Intuitive motion or button controls, a shot gauge that adapts to the curve of the course, and other new features make it easy for both new players and seasoned pros to drive and putt with power.

name: Samurai Warriors 5
description: Experience exhilarating action set in a dramatic historical setting in SAMURAI WARRIORS 5. As the latest numbered entry in the SAMURAI WARRIORS franchise, the story, characters, and visuals have been re-imagined to set the stage for a thrilling new series. The story takes place after the Ōnin War during the golden age of the Sengoku period, and features a story that centers on the lives of two of the most representative military commanders of this era: Nobunaga Oda and Mitsuhide Akechi.

name: Endocrisis
description:
Endocrisis is a challenging shoot'em up videogame with zero lives.
Games of this style usually focus on shooting and evading. But in Endocrisis, it is different since your ship can absorb enemy shots to increase your power and thus resist enemy attacks

name: Idoly Pride
description: Idoly Pride is a mobile idol management game developed by QualiArts, where you become a manager and support your idols in their busy activities, such as handshake meetings, TV appearances, and live performances. You can consult with them, deepen your bond with them, and lead them to become top idols!

name: Last Message
description: Last message is a short atmospheric thriller / narrative / adventure game that brings you into a world overrun by infected.

name: Redmatch 2
description: Redmatch 2 is a free online multiplayer first person shooter with 13 maps and a few weapons and gamemodes to choose from. Upgrade your players stats in-game using kill-points to get an advantage! Perfect for a few matches with friends or playing with people from our discord server.

name: Scarlet Nexus
description:
In a far distant future, a psionic hormone was discovered in the human brain, granting people extra-sensory powers and changing the world as we know it.

Just as humanity was entering this new era, deranged mutants known as Others began to descend from the sky with a thirst for human brains. Highly resistant to conventional attack methods, extreme measures needed to be taken to battle the overwhelming threat and preserve humanity.

Those with acute extra-sensory abilities, known as psionics, were our chance to fight the onslaught from above. To this day, psionics have been scouted for their talents and recruited to the Other Suppression Force (OSF), humanity’s last line of defense.

Take on the role of Yuito Sumeragi, a new recruit to the OSF aiming to become an elite psionic like the one who saved him as a child. Armed with a talent in psycho-kinesis, explore the futuristic city of New Himuka and uncover the mysteries of a Brain Punk future caught between technology and psychic abilities in SCARLET NEXUS.

name: Broken Hearts Club: Blue Bird Blues
description: Broken Hearts Club - Blue Bird Blues is a dating game with layers upon layers of choices that interweave into your dates emotions. Will you choose to show your true soul or let them walk over you? Will you choose to break a heart even if it was the right thing to do?

name: Gladium
description: Gladium is a gladiatorial arena fighter with fast-paced action combat and gory pixels. Take on waves of gladiators, slay them all and challenge the mighty champions of the arena! Analyze your opponents weakness, adapt your strategy and colour the sands with the blood of your enemies.

name: The Pegasus Dream Tour
description:
The first official Paralympics videogame.
Made in partnership with the International Paralympic Committee (IPC) being developed by JP Games, a studio founded by Final Fantasy XV director Hajime Tabata after he left Square Enix.

The game is a sports RPG taking place in a fantasy metropolis, Pegasus City, where competitors will awaken special abilities, Xtra Powers, while competing in the Paralympic Games.
Planned to be released in 2020 across various platforms.

name: Dress-Up Pups
description: Pattie is an animal-lover, working at the Dress-Up Pups fashion agency for dogs. Help her deal with ten different clients, each with their own dog and their own special requests, in this hilarious and exciting Match-3 adventure.

name: Worms Rumble: Emote Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Worms Rumble: Armageddon Weapon Skin Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Worms Rumble: Action All-Stars Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Worms Rumble: Spaceworm and Alien Double Pack
description: Worms in Spaaaaaace! Kit out your Worm with outfits, banners, emotes, weapon skins and titles that are out of this world!

name: Worms Rumble: Cats & Dogs Double Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Worms Rumble: Legends Pack
description: Celebrate 25 years of Worms icons with the Legends Pack! Customise your Worm with these awesome outfits, weapon skins and banners.

name: Worms Rumble: Honor & Death Pack
description: Rekindle your hunger for battle and glory with the Honor and Death Pack. As the forces of good and evil clash, where will you swear allegiance?

name: Worms Rumble: Captain & Shark Double Pack
description: Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the arena… Land the Captain and Shark Double Pack today to receive new outfits, weapon skins, titles, banners and emotes to use on the battlefield in salty style!

name: Worms Rumble: Bank Heist Double Pack
description: Tool up with the Bank Heist Double Pack! Equipping you with outfits, emotes, banners and weapon skins to pull the ultimate bank job.

name: New Scuffed Epic Visual Novel
description: This is New Scuffed Epic Visual Novel, which is a story set in the world of New Scuffed Epic BHOP Simulator, play as a character of your choice, as you run into some new, and familiar faces along the way.

name: Fantasy Cascade: Episode 1 - Overspill
description: A twine game about a tired, closeted office worker's struggles with sexuality and lucid nightmares.

name: Hatsune Miku Tycoon
description: Play Tycoon with Hatsune Miku themed playing cards!

name: Aion Classic
description: Aion Classic is a free-to-play return to the original Aion service that began in 2009. It is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) developed and published by the South Korean company NCSOFT. The game combines PvP and PvE in a fantasy game environment.

name: Minecraft: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: Sonic the Hedgehog races into Minecraft at supersonic speeds! Sprint, roll, and spring off enemies through iconic zones, with infinite gameplay. Master the thrilling abilities of Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, and more! Compete with friends for high scores. Unlock achievements, characters, new zones, and a challenging Eggman Mode! Includes 29 popular skins.

name: Halo: The Master Chief Collection Season 7 - Elite
description: Season 7 succeeded Season 6, in June 2021. Named after the human designation for the Sangheili, the season included seven new armor permutations from Halo Online for the Elites as well as skins for the Type-1 energy sword for Halo 3, alongside vehicle skins and graphical updates for Halo: Combat Evolved, and the Champions Bundle content, weapon skins, armor effects, and the KEYSTONE helmet for Halo 4. It also added a new map for Halo 3, Edge.

name: The Ants: Underground Kingdom
description: Sin descripción

name: The Dark Prophecy
description: The Dark Prophecy is a 2D pixel-art point & click adventure inspired by the best retro games of the 90's. Welcome to a peaceful medieval village, where life is safe and calm. But one fateful night, everything changes.

name: Idle Farming Tycoon Empire
description: Have you are thought about building a farm empire and being a rich farmer billionaire? Become an idle billionaire manager in this new tycoon clicker simulator game. Earn idle money to become a rich millionaire tycoon! Build up, upgrade and expand your millionaire farming empire in this capitalist tap clicker game. Improve your productivity by automating your specialized farms by investing in your new managers and level up their earnings.

name: Niche: Breed and Evolve
description:
Niche: Breed and Evolve is a breeding and simulator game for genetics fans.
Welcome to the world of Nichelings, a secret world, with unique animals, real genetics and many adventures! Do you have what it takes to be a pack leader?
Experience a genetics & breeding simulation game with cute animals and thousands of different gene combinations! Grow and strengthen your pack through selective breeding based on real genetics. Go on a journey of discovery with your animals and encounter new islands, animals, enemies and genes! Experience a genetic adventure: Breed and develop strong Nichelings and make your pack the strongest in the world of Niche!

name: Super Mario Bros. S: Road to Infinity
description: Run as far as you can in an infinitely-generating level! Collect coins and moons to buy powerups such as the iconic fire flower and ice flower and the custom blade star, and defeat both familiar and custom enemies to earn more time. As you run, you'll face increasingly dangerous foes and obstacles, so be prepared!

name: Buddy and Lucky Solitaire
description: City or countryside? Play Classic Solitaire where you feel like it today, with your pet friends Buddy and Lucky.

name: Surface: Lost Tales - Collector's Edition
description: Not all fairy tales are just stories…

name: Lip! Lewd Idol Project Vol. 1
description: Welcome to the world of Lewd Idols! But… What exactly is a Lewd Idol? Join Kairi, the shy aspiring star, and Ranko, her depraved self-proclaimed producer on this lewd journey! Explore Akihabara, form an idol group, and overcome the odds while having lots of girl-on-girl action! Are you ready for it?

name: Assassin Run 2D
description: Sin descripción

name: Worms Rumble: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: The Digital Deluxe Edition includes: • Worms Rumble Base Game • Legends Pack: 6 Outfits, Retro Commando, Sheep, Donkey, Skunk, Cow and Pigeon (each with 3 colour variants!) 6 Weapon Skins - Retro, Wooly, Concrete, Poison, Bovine, Feathers and 6 Banners

name: Robolife: Days with Aino
description: There's nothing better than living with a robot girl! Get your wrench on and show her your mechanic power! But beware, she might be more than just a regular robot...

name: Cyberwinter
description: Cyberwinter is an isometric action strategy game. On a distant planet with a harsh climate, you have to fight legions of dangerous monsters for a new home for humanity. Build bases, develop and defend them.

name: Riding Shotgun
description: A micro party game where one person controls the movement and another person controls the shooting.

name: Green Fairy VR
description: Follow the Green Fairy’s adventure as she learns to appreciate her unique green glow by finding refuge at the traffic lights in the Big Little City.

name: Inflatable doll
description: A beautiful woman will always catch a boy's eye. Where you look depends on your preferences. This game could be the start for you!

name: Russian Hentai 3
description: This is the third part of Russian Hentai. This time you have to defend your village from the gopniks.

name: Thrice in a row: A new adventure
description: Continuation of the great puzzle. Available 28 completely new levels. Thrice in a row is a logic game for creating chains of identical elements. The goal of the game is to put in a row from 3 identical elements, get points and go to the next level There are also bonuses.

name: Stride.net
description: Stride.net is an online multiplayer Stride mode where players can find endless fun competing in various battles in urban environments perfectly tailored for parkour action.

name: Zolaris
description: In the first person stealth shooter, Zolaris, Valeria and her spirit companion, Pike, set out to steal the ancient artifact, Zolaris, from a group known as The Cult of the End in order to save her little sister, Velvet.

name: AMG
description: Doomsday is a sci-fi interstellar war strategy online game.

name: Robobo TM
description: Immerse yourself in a strange world. Shoot all Time Gears to stop the time counter. Find and get all the Buggy Bugs. Update yourself and discover new skills. Save those trapped in the ice and help the Teetaks.

name: Comic Company Manager
description: Have you ever wanted to run a comic book company and create your own characters? Then this is the game for you. Hire people and expand your offices as you launch more and more comics or crash and burn with terrible comics no one buys.

name: Crazy Foods
description: Crazy Foods is a massively multiplayer online battle arena game with upcoming crazy modes where foods are going crazy eliminating each other until one winner or team will get the fork throne!

name: Wood Killer
description: Lost in a dark house, you try to escape from a bloodthirsty cannibal in an entirely unknown area, where many murders have already occurred. As a cop, try to figure out how to escape the clutches of the wood killer

name: Battle Lust
description: Conquer the Amazon Kingdom and all its tribes in this steamy hot F2P Card Game. Collect and form the best team to save the habitants of this kingdom through an addictive blackjack system.

name: Redacted Epilogue
description: Set a few years after the events of the comic book "REDACTED: Revival", this 2.5D first-person RPG with turn-based combat continues the story of the former Black Ops experimental soldier known by the codename "The Black Anvil", as he prepares to defend civilization from another latent threat.

name: Momiji From Purgatory
description: Hi everyone, player will operating a teenager and socialize with a beautiful female classmate A, after being together for a few months, the man fell in love with another female classmate B, after the cheating is revealed, a series of processes of killing each other in order to save love will begin.

name: Live by the Sword: Tactics
description:
A loadout based Tactical RPG currently in Early Access. Featuring a Single Player campaign, a roguelike Adventure Mode, local and online multiplayer and a board builder.

Build your team with 7 unique classes each featuring a different move set of abilities and attacks. Outmanoeuvre your opponent or die on the battlefield.

name: Army of Numbers
description: A arithmetic game, let you play at the same time exercise arithmetic reaction ability.

name: BangBangShooting
description: Players play the role of an amnesia "exile", looking for their own past in the end of the world. Gradually awaken your ability in the battle, collect and upgrade all kinds of powerful weapons to defeat the enemy blocking the way!

name: Street Racing: United
description: Street Racing: United - inovation autosimulator about Street Racing. In the begining you have some money for your first car. After you can buy car and tuning it.

name: Monstrous Lovers
description: In this Boys' Love visual novel about dating monsters, you play as Christopher Wells, a young office worker who moves to a town full of supernatural creatures in hopes of getting to make a real difference.

name: ShootOut(SystemD)
description: ShootOut(SystemD) is a Third-Person Shooter with RogueLite elements. Shoot your way through procedurally generated environements. Choose your arsenal from a variety of weapons and tools. Save civilians and train them to be your backfire or healer. Capture Enemy bases. Defend yours.

name: Run Prop, Run!
description: Run Prop, Run! is an online hide-and-seek game, based on the classic Prop Hunt mod, but with a few twists!

name: Chrono's Arena
description: Get your character, choose your skills, and be the next champion of the Chrono's Arena! A fresh air to the action multiplayer games. Three unique game modes, and dozens of combinations, one match will never be like another!

name: Ninja Frog
description: A cute and easy platformer game.

name: Out of Line
description: A unique adventure game filled with beautiful puzzles all hand-drawn in an original 2D style . Out of Line follows the adventures of San in a quest to escape the Factory that was once home. Dive into a story set in a mysterious world that is revealed through multiple chapters.

name: Sinister 625
description: Community mapping event in celebration of Quake's 25th anniversary: nine large levels in varying themes + a starting hub, all following the "625" rule of using only six different textures (6 for June), featuring two surprises and five enemy types (2 and 5 for 25 years of Quake).

name: SCP-087-B
description: Sin descripción

name: Jetpack Joyride+
description: Bullet-powered jetpacks! Giant mechanical dragons! Birds that shoot money!

name: Planet Zoo: Africa Pack
description: Embark on an unforgettable African adventure with the Planet Zoo: Africa Pack! Adopt and raise five stunning new animals, master the challenge zoo set in an oasis bazaar, and build out the zoo of your dreams with over 180 beautiful new scenery pieces.

name: SturmFront: The Mutant War - Farewell Edition
description: Purge mutants with your flamethrower in this twin-stick arcade shooter, as you make your way across a derelict cityscape fuelled by the sounds of heavy metal and psychedelic Electronica!

name: SnowRunner: Tatra Dual Pack
description: Expand and bring even more versatility to your SnowRunner fleet with the Tatra Dual Pack, giving you access to the iconic Tatra 813 and Tatra 805!

name: Kira-kira Star Night exa
description: KIRA KIRA STAR NIGHT is an action game created by renowned manga artist and illustrator RIKI. From the graphics, sound to the game’s programming, an all star cast of creators have joined together to make this 8-bit tour de force that has been released over a number of formats. Now, KIRA KIRA STAR NIGHT exa comes to the arcade in pixel perfect aspect ratio form with even faster response times than the NES original at a special price point. For the first time ever, play the game at 4K in both horizontal and vertical screen orientations.

name: Desolatium: Prologue
description: Desolatium: Prologue is a first-person point & click Graphic Adventure based on Lovecraft Mythos. Live this horror story where you will have to visit mysterious locations, face lovecraftian creatures, find clues and combine objects to solve puzzles.

name: Quake: Q25 Limits Jam
description: Q25 Limits Jam is a vanilla Quake collaborative jam made for Quake's 25th anniversary which reads; a great collection of maps made in the spirit of "Maximum DOS Performance". 16 small to large Old-School levels in varying classic themes, and a start hub map, all keeping within the original game's technical and stylistic restraints.

name: Seal of Sins
description: "Seal of Sins" is a independent horizontal action game. It is based on ancient fantasy myths. The mysterious messenger wakes you up according to the agreement, and you have embarked on an unknown journey since then. In a world with a strong ancient and wild atmosphere, you will experience many hardships, compose tragic epics in tense and exciting battles, integrate puzzle-solving elements, and face the dual challenges of strategy and operation!

name: Cat Boy's Stellar Journey
description: Join cat boy as he travels through the stars on his way to meet his sister. Along the way, relax at a hot spring and pick flowers in a meadow. Cat Boy's Stellar Journey is a tiny adventure game about traveling and the things we leave behind...

name: Hue^2
description: Hue² is a puzzle game, which brings calmness, peace, and a sense of harmony. You need to place the colored cubes in a harmonious way in the gradient. The locked cubes are not moveable and they will be your guide. It seems that it is a piece of cake, right? Well, the beginning levels are really easy to pass, but on the other hand, when the number of locked cubes and the number of colorful cubes increase, the game becomes more interesting and challenging. 377 levels will challenge your logic and sense of color.

name: Cubo ao Topo
description: "Cubo ao topo" is a strategy game played in the Twitch channel chat.

name: Graveyard Keeper: Ultimate Collector's Edition
description: The ultimate Graveyard Keeper experience with a complete set of all 3 DLCs! Build and manage a medieval graveyard while facing ethical dilemmas and making questionable decisions. Welcome to Graveyard Keeper, the most inaccurate medieval cemetery sim of the year.

name: shapez.io: Puzzle DLC
description: You enjoyed scaling down and optimizing machines in shapez? Now it's its own game mode! Solve the puzzles by creating the given shapes, but space and buildings are limited - there are no resources and you only get a given amount of shape types and colors to work with!

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 3
description: In Season Three’s undoubted star attraction and the game’s biggest update in years, Sea of Thieves collides with Disney’s Pirates of the Caribbean for the ultimate pirate crossover in Sea of Thieves: A Pirate’s Life! Join forces with Captain Jack Sparrow and fend off his old enemy, the notorious Davy Jones, to save the Sea of Thieves from catastrophe in this breathtaking original story.

name: Youmu Konpaku & Dungeon of Lewd Creatures
description: Getting into a hideout of creatures that aim at cute girls, Youmu-chan tries to escape in this side-scroller ACT game!

name: OMSI 2: IVECO Bus Family Interurban Generation
description: IVECO, the world leader in intercity buses, launched its new coach range in 2013 under the new IVECO BUS brand. Discover this new series of intercity buses in OMSI now!

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Mission 8: Abaddon Asylum
description: The nefarious Baron Umbra has been revealed as an occult mastermind, and hidden away in heavily fortified cultist territory! The only way in is through the catacombs, lead by a survivor known only as 'The Angel'. Can the Resistance reach the asylum, stop the Baron and put an end to his evil? Or will the catacombs get a few extra corpses?

name: Marvel's Avengers: Cosmic Cube
description: The time to wrest control of the Cosmic Cube from Monica Rappaccini has come in the new Villain Sector mission “Beating the Odds.” But the weapon’s immense power has made her an even greater threat, requiring the Avengers to use their wits and heroic powers to defeat her solo or in teams of up to four players. This Villain Sector continues the storyline from Marvel’s Avengers Operation: Hawkeye - Future Imperfect and sets the stage for upcoming releases.

name: Links E6: Course Pack 2
description:
Links E6 is the best virtual golf experience ever created. Explore more world-class golf courses with this DLC Course Pack!

This Pack contains: Grand Country Club, The Club at Hokulia, Jeremy Ranch Golf & Country Club, Prairie Dunes Country Club, and Stone Canyon Club.

name: Links E6: Course Pack 3
description:
Links E6 is the best virtual golf experience ever created. Explore more world-class golf courses with this DLC Course Pack!

This Pack contains: Pine Canyon, Royal Troon, Sanctuary Golf Club, Glenwild Golf Club, and Fairmont Chateau Whistler Golf Club.

name: Links E6: Course Pack 1
description:
Links E6 is the best virtual golf experience ever created. Explore more world-class golf courses with this DLC Course Pack!

This Pack contains: Asiana, Barton Creek - Fazio Foothills, Cabo Del Sol, The Greenbrier (The Old White), and Wade Hampton.

name: 3 Cushion Masters
description: 3cushion masters is a Billiards game with very interesting leveled stages.

name: Gopnik
description: Do you want to feel like a native of Russia in the mid-90s? Then this game is for you.

name: Slobbish Dragon Princess Love + Plus
description: Haru and the gang are back in Slobbish Dragon Princess Love + PLUS! Enjoy three short stories for Haru, Suzuka and Dorami which takes place after the events of Slobbish Dragon Princess.

name: Card Tower Defence
description: Poker + Blackjack + Tower Defense = Card Tower Defense You can enjoy the fun of card games and the fun of tower defense. Towers can be combined using the rules of poker. Towers can be sold using the rules of Blackjack. 20 Stage, 20 Mission, 31 Ability, 60 Types Tower, 8 Types Monster.

name: What's Different
description: Xiaoqing new fault finding game

name: Mystery Trackers: Paxton Creek Avenger Collector's Edition
description:
Someone's made it their personal vendetta to bring down the Mystery Trackers.

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won't find in the standard version. The Collector's Edition includes:
• Return to the theater to save a film crew in the bonus game.
• Collect musicians and listen to them play in your own orchestra.
• Earn special achievements and find morphing objects.
• Get the available Strategy Guide.
• Enjoy soundtracks, wallpaper, and concept art.

name: Cute Animals Memory Card Game
description: Match pairs of cards with pictures of cute animals. With two game modes.

name: Host 714
description:
In Host 714, you are going to live as Squid, a drug addicted hobo who was invited by a governmental organization, the Orange Institute, to join a drug addiction rehab center with experimental treatment and social reintegration.
Arriving at the Institute on a faraway island, Squid realizes that the proposal was not what they claimed to be. Now you are a test subject, with an uncertain fate. Help our protagonist escape from the Orange Institute in this challenging stealth game!

name: Shoujo Shuryou no Suiri Ryouiki: Kogane Shima no Mitsuyaku
description:
On an island ruled by the mafia, a young girl's quest starts...

This story takes place in 2002 on a group of islands named Gueml in the Atlantic Ocean. Our main character has decided to find out the truth behind the previous mafia boss' - her father's - murder. The islands of Gueml are divided into four parts which are all dominated by the mafia, so in order to get any leads, she needs to talk to the boss of each and every area and make deals. In order to find out the truth, and maybe even find out more about the islands where she lives, the main character has to go through various sacrifices and has to make deals of all kinds. However, the ending is completely dependent on whatever choice you make.

name: Escape: Forced Overtime
description: The heroine of this game was not lucky to meet with the thief when she came to work in a non-working day. Now she is tied up and she needs to find a way to free.

name: Endless Love
description: Endless Love is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Soulfire: Weapon Master
description: Soulfire is a souls-like, side scroller action competitive game, integrating (stitching) multiple game modes, including the classic battle royale mode. Whether it is melee, long-range, or support, there will always be a fighting style that suits you. May you survive to the end in the cruel fighting!

name: Infees
description: Infees is a single player voxel game. At the moment it has only one playable mode where you have to kill zombies and survive as long as possible, there are many weapons at your disposal to make this task easier!

name: Sentry: Obelisk of Dawn
description: “Sentry :Obelisk of Dawn” is a VR-like MOBA game. The game supports 5vs5 sports at most, and players can customize and cultivate their own combat characters to participate in fierce battles on the battlefield.

name: The Last Yandere: Cursed Dark
description: The Last Yandere: Cursed Dark is a horror visual novel that takes place within the mythology of the AppSir Games Universe. You play the role of an amnesiac trying to find his place in the world after losing his memories three years prior. Soon after, he meets a mysterious woman named Kara.

name: Links E6
description: Links E6 is an entirely new digital golf experience. This first person simulation puts you in the game creating the ultimate sensation of being on the course. With world-class courses and online competition, Links E6 is connecting golfers, gamers and fans to the future of golf.

name: Hoples
description: Hoples - 2D hardcore precision platformer with time limits.

name: Mystery of Camp Enigma 2
description: A thrilling puzzle adventure, inspired by hidden object escape room games. Picking up from the radio tower. You discover a remote signal being transmitted from somewhere on the island. Your objective to investigate, along with your continuing mission to discover the missing army personnel.

name: Arausio
description: Explore the ancient theatre of Arausio and discover Roman antiquity in this narrative exploration game!

name: Sea of Thieves: A Pirate's Life
description: Split across five incredible Tall Tales packed with secrets and side-quests, Sea of Thieves: A Pirate’s Life sees Captain Jack Sparrow sailing in from beyond the horizon to sweep players into an epic new adventure!

name: My Business
description: My Business is the first realistic game in which you have to become a business shark.

name: Vedelem: The Golden Horde
description: Vedelem: The Golden Horde is a medieval Real Time Strategy and Survival game set in the 13th century. Build, expand and defend your lands against the deadliest Mongolian invasion ever witnessed. They will seek to destroy your walls and salt your earth. Will you survive the Golden Horde?

name: Desert Parkour
description: Desert Parkour is a first-person 3D platformer game, where player progress through levels using parkour skills and by throwing a rope with a grappling hook.

name: Barn Finders: Amerykan Dream
description: Take a scenic road trip through Ameryka to visit new locations full of new exciting adventures and stuff to loot

name: Dungeons & Dragons: Dark Alliance - Deluxe Edition
description:
Set in the Forgotten Realms, the game features real-time combat and dynamic co-op gameplay, and pits the infamous Drizzt Do'Urden and his legendary companions – Catti-brie, Bruenor, and Wulfgar – against some of the most iconic monsters from the world of Dungeons & Dragons. Frost Giants, Beholders, and White Dragons roam the frozen tundra of Icewind Dale in search of the Crystal Shard— and it's up to the companions to muster the strength to stop them from claiming and using it to destroy their home.

The Deluxe Edition includes:
- Dark Alliance game
- Beholder Weapon Set
- Lich Weapon Set: characters can wield a Lich-themed scimitar, bow, axe, or hammer
- Echoes of the Blood War expansion content

name: Exodus Borealis
description: In this city builder and tower defense game, you will command a small band of ship wrecked colonists. Go from struggling to survive the elements to a thriving kingdom that will smash the demon hordes that dare attack your settlement.

name: Dungeons & Dragons: Dark Alliance - Steelbook Edition
description:
Set in the Forgotten Realms, the game features real-time combat and dynamic co-op gameplay, and pits the infamous Drizzt Do'Urden and his legendary companions – Catti-brie, Bruenor, and Wulfgar – against some of the most iconic monsters from the world of Dungeons & Dragons. Frost Giants, Beholders, and White Dragons roam the frozen tundra of Icewind Dale in search of the Crystal Shard— and it's up to the companions to muster the strength to stop them from claiming and using it to destroy their home.

The Steelbook Edition includes:
- Dark Alliance game
- Beholder Weapon Set
- Lich Weapon Set
- Echoes of the Blood War expansion content
- Mini Art Book
- Official Soundtrack of Dark Alliance
- Collectible Steelbook Case

name: Labyrinth City: Pierre the Maze Detective
description: Adapted from the bestselling children’s book series Pierre The Maze Detective, play as Pierre in this adventure/puzzle game and recover the stolen Maze Stone. Journey through breathtakingly hand-drawn illustrations, meet eccentric characters, and solve puzzles to save Opera City!

name: Alex Kidd in Miracle World DX
description:
The legendary Alex Kidd returns with Alex Kidd in Miracle World DX!
Since his first appearance in 1986 with Alex Kidd in Miracle World. The iconic Alex Kidd makes his return to smash rocks, collect coins and tackle bosses once again in Alex Kidd in Miracle World DX!

Return The Kingdom of Radaxian to its former glory and destroy the evil Janken the Great!
Comprising of all levels from the original title as well as brand new levels which expand the lore of Alex Kidd, experience Miracle World like you’ve never seen it before with new animations, graphical detail and gameplay improvements.

name: Super Magbot
description:
Super Magbot is a precision platformer with no jumping! Players will have to traverse four distinct worlds with new mechanics and challenges unlocking along the way.

Learn how to use Super Magbot's magnetic powers and use the different magnets to beat more than 150 levels.

Enjoy unique challenging mechanics with classic 16-bit gaming vibes.

name: Pulsar: Lost Colony
description:
Team up to operate an advanced starship and explore a randomized galaxy falling into chaos. Each player assumes a role aboard the ship: Captain, Pilot, Scientist, Weapons Specialist and Engineer. Coordination between your crewmembers will be essential in order to survive the perils that await you.

Control the various stations that run your ship. Reroute power between ship systems, scan alien planets for lifeforms, run powerful programs to change the tide of battle, or start up the warp drive to escape a conflict you cannot win. The strategies you use are up to you—or your Captain.

Embark on missions, investigate abandoned stations, and scavenge for components that could aid you in your voyage. Teleport down to the surfaces of alien planets, where you may face extreme environments and dangerous creatures. Trek across the galaxy, and discover what lies on its fringes.

name: Brawl Stars: Jurassic Splash
description: Sin descripción

name: A Day at the Beach
description: A very short flatgame for class about a day at the beach with my girlfriend and feeling helpless.

name: Knights of Pen & Paper 3
description: Enter the new and improved world of chivalry, class warfare and off-beat pop references. Knights of Pen & Paper 3 is a true sequel to the turn-based, retro style, pixel-art adventure full of danger and saving throws you hold so dear!

name: Ikkaku Senkin
description: A high score shoot em up where you catch as many Koban money in O-Edo city!

name: Henri's Secret 2
description: Henri's Secret 2 is a sequel to 2017's visual novel created by Nineland and developed by Beemoov, where you continue to live the adventures of Lyla, a student who has found love. Mystery and passion await you in this interactive novel! Discover an exciting romance where friendship, humor, passion, and... superstars come together!

name: Wordle
description: A daily puzzle game in which players must guess the five-letter word of the day within six attempts, with each failed guess giving them information as to whether the letters they have used appear in the correct word, and where.

name: Haunted Hotel: A Past Redeemed
description: Your cousin goes missing and ghosts start taking over your wedding venue! Can you defeat an old adversary and change the course of fate before it’s too late?

name: Can You Hear the Echo?
description: a poetry twine game about my gender

name: 10-103: Null Kelvin
description: Another short action narrative horror game as a Special Ops. Infiltrate. Investigate. Exterminate.

name: Riddle of the Sphinx
description: Explore secret chambers. Discover hidden tombs. Unearth ancient riddles. And unravel an ancient riddle, entombed for centuries by the ancient Egyptians! Riddle of the Sphinx is an epic ancient Egyptian adventure featuring unlimited exploration in and around the Giza Sphinx and Great Pyramid of Cheops. This is your opportunity to immerse yourself into the Giza Sphinx and Great Pyramid - one of the last seven wonders of the ancient world.Download Riddle of the Sphinx to explore and discover the mysteries of Ancient Egypt!

name: Life on a Pizza
description: You are no longer the eater; you are the eaten. Play as toppings trying to survive on a pizza from the hungry Jaw biting its way to you and the ants pushing you to your delicious death. Customize the pizza, pick a mode and your topping, then hop in this hysterical party or solo game.

name: Unmaze
description: Two young boys are lost in a maze and it's up to you to save them. Guide Asterion and Theseus out of the maze in this visual novel inspired by Greek mythology. Place your phone in the light to talk to Theseus, or in the shade to talk to Asterion. But be careful - the more you help one of them, the more the other gets lost. Help them make the right decisions as you face up to lots of different dangers, discover the secrets of the maze and perhaps manage to set them free. Their fate now rests in your hands. Will your cunning, wisdom, perseverance and skill be enough to help you make the right choices?

name: Longming Punk
description:
This is a live culture in a fast developing flow of an era, where the legend of 'Long Shen' continuously circulates around the streets. According to the legend, Shen Long has unmatched powers, being able to protect people and watch over them.

Yet people only knew without ever have seen his existence, that Long Shen was residing within Mt. Long Ming.

However in recent years there have been some people with differential behaviors; in the records some who took great interest finally captured Long Shen's power, and many others emulated the search for power by any means necessary, making them depend on the mountain top.

Though lately there is a rumor that Long Shen is about to change hands again. Everyone starts to become restless, and as big bro Yao Huo is one among them who possess the godly powers and its dependencies, his guidance in the strength of highly capable people certainly cannot be looked down upon. Then what does it mean to wait for big bro Yao Huo?

Does he have the ability to reveal Long Shen's real face, turning into the lord of the mountain region? This is all or nothing, and you will come to witness all of it!

name: Imaginaria
description: Imaginaria is both a night watch and the night watcher. It's a military term, supposedly coming from Latin, Imaginarius: relative to a mental figure. Perhaps because under Imaginaria duty the mind likes to wander too. Here in Antarctica we do them since the incident. And tonight I am Imaginaria.

name: Cat Dungeon Escape
description: Cat Dungeon Escape is a challenging casual puzzle game with some precision platform elements where you can invert the gravity and rotate the scene. Beat the traps and grab the key to open the door and escape. Are you ready for this Challenge?

name: Anagraphs: An Anagram Game With a Twist
description: Anagrams with a twist! From the creator of the popular word game Synonymy, an addicting new word game where the anagram possibilities are greater than ever before.

name: Marionette lab
description: A third-person action game with a fixed camera and elements of survival horror.

name: The Little Tank Hunter
description: Your mission is to destroy the tank master, can you do it? Shoot yourself through various levels and collect coins. Be careful, if you die you lose some of them. Find the hidden emeralds and use them to upgrade your tank.

name: Fastlane Bowling
description: Realistic bowling simulation with12 extremely detailed 3D environments Choose from and personalize 8 lifelike male and female characters Control the strength, accuracy, position, and spin of every throw Fantasy locations include ancient Egypt, a Moon base, and a Pirate ship 6 game-play modes

name: Snowboarding
description: Snowboard on slopes and on ramps, perform stunts and get points.

name: Fugitive 3D
description: Multiplayer, objective based, Hide & Seek! Cross-play between Flat and VR!

name: Breath of Spirits
description: With the power of the Spirit, defeat the enemies and purify the land of elves. Gain different elemental abilities and various Elf`s costumes in single play mode, or cooperate with other players and survive the horde in multiplayer mode.

name: The Legends in Kylamar
description: The Legends in Kylamar is an action, thrilling turn-based RPG that will immerse the player in a world filled with enemies, surprises, and more importantly, memories!

name: Selection Process
description: Selection Process is a game in which we will be in the process of selecting the job of our dreams. To overcome it, we will arm ourselves with our crossbow launching CVs and defeat the rest of the candidates who are opting for the job.

name: Chess Valley 2
description: Play chess in a way you've never played. Face a board like a labyrinth and try to cross it with the king to join his army.

name: Mouse Hunter
description: Mouse Hunter - a puzzle game with a top view, executed in 2D graphics, where you have to catch the mouse.

name: Path of Sacrifice
description: This is a game that you will become weaker.You are a powerful magic knight, but you need sacrifice them to arrive the next floor.Until you lost everything,like a mortal challenged the constantly growing devil king.The only thing left in the end is your exquisite swordsmanship and brave heart.

name: Guess Your Fist
description: A story-driven adventure -- 《Guess Your Fist》

name: Love in Belarus
description: Love in Belarus is a fascinating love story with a Belarusian dictator. Melt the heart of the usurper of power!

name: Wood Block Escape Puzzles 2
description: Wood block escape puzzles a fun and simple way to relax and challenge your logical reasining and concentration.

name: Mado no Naka no Saki ni Aru Mono
description: This game is a puzzle game in which you aim for the goal window by switching between two perspectives, one viewed from the side and the other viewed from above. The biggest feature is that when you change the viewpoint, the depth and height also change.

name: ppL: The Animated Adventures
description:
A challenging 2D platformer with hard boss fights and unique mechanics. Contains several bosses and platformer levels.
Includes two difficulties, different weapon choices, different paths of passing through the game and a lot of surprises...

name: Antiprism
description:
Test your aim and dodging abilities against elite enemies, unique bosses and environmental hazards, as you uncover the secrets of the Antiprism and its connection to the extinct civilization of Arn.
Collect items and credits from your encounters and use them to customize and upgrade parts of your ships - you will need all the firepower you can get in order to reach the end of our pilots' journey.

name: Ghost of the Seas
description: Ghost of The Seas is a first-person open adventure game created by one-man developer using Unity Engine, where the player have to find the Harkenon Wheel to escape from Seaworld.

name: Noir Punk
description: 2D sidescrolling adventure narrative game with puzzle solving and platforming elements.

name: Bubbaruka!
description: A horror puzzle simulator about exploring an abandoned children's game, stalked by the the shambling husks of scrapped concepts that pursue you endlessly throughout the environment as you try to solve the cryptic puzzles left behind by the developers and keep your pet alive.

name: Gazmatera: Return of the Generals
description: In the years between 1988 and 1994, somewhere in Europe a squadron of the best fighters from crime, called "generals", was blacklisted for liquidation. Take control of four survivors, Jeff, Kayla, Helga and Emilia, and exterminate the leader of the enemy gang!

name: Grand Line Adventures
description: Grand Line Adventures (GLA) is a free MMORPG (massive multiplayer online role playing game) set in the world of One Piece, where you can play many characters from the anime.

name: Fort Boyard: Nouvelle Edition - Toujours Plus Fort
description: Sin descripción

name: Huntfeast
description:
Prepare for the Werewolf Hunt!
Misanthrope’s curse echoes through the woods of Lovengrad. Terrible monsters, led by the werewolf, hunt for their prey. An oppressive atmosphere paired with the thrill of hunting makes this game unlike any other. Begin the Huntfeast, where you are a hunter who hunts alone or with a friend.

name: Mindmist
description: Mindmist is a first person, story driven game about exploring the dark side of the human history. You will visit past and witness some of the historical events that represents how we, as humans, are greedy and inclined to fight.

name: Ender Lilies: Quietus of the Knights
description:
Ender Lilies is a dark fantasy 2D Action RPG about unraveling the mysteries of a nation destroyed by a cataclysmic event. The fallen Kingdom of End is a tragic and beautiful world featuring a majestic castle, submerged forests and forbidden underground areas.

On this sorrowful journey, encounter horrific enemies against whom a moment of inattention could be fatal. By releasing foes from their undying curse, you may gain their strength. Overcome the hardships of your journey and uncover the truth with the aid of the fallen knights.

name: Sierra Ops: Episode 2 - Dissonance and Resonance
description:
With the front lines inching ever closer to Earth after the devastating battle at Mondshire, Junius must come to terms with his new role, and with those who he must now fight beside as mixed opinions about his promotions arise. Given the freedom to choose his assignments, the newly minted Captain and Squadron Leader is faced with the dilemma of having too little time to accomplish too much in a post befitting of someone far more experienced. As one of the few elites chosen for the reborn, 1st fleet of old, Junius must fight to meet the expectation of those all around him and earn the respect of his crew while struggling to do his duty and what he believes is right.
Will he able to rally his crew to action?
Will the United Terran Vanguard be able to put itself back together before it’s too late?
Is it possible to wage a just war?

Sierra Ops Episode 2: Dissonance and Resonance is part two of a four-part series where both decisions made and performance in combat change the power balance of the two armed forces.
